metadata.title: CVE-2018-15664 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Docker through 18.06.1-ce-rc2, the API endpoints behind the 'docker cp'command are vulnerable to a symlink-exchange attack with DirectoryTraversal, giving attackers arbitrary read-write access to the hostfilesystem with root privileges, because daemon/archive.go does not doarchive operations on a frozen filesystem (or from within a chroot).

criterions.comment: docker.io: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
